name: Malphite
title: Éclat du monolithe
lore:
Malphite est une créature de pierre vivante, née pour servir le Monolithe, une forteresse volante de pierre élémentaire créée par l'orgueilleux Transfiguré (Ascended) Ne'Zuk, un mage d'Ixtal. Ne'Zuk avait promis à l'Empire Shurimien de créer une arme assez puissante pour éradiquer le Néant (Void) à sa source, dans les ruines d'Icathia.

Le Monolithe, de la taille d'une cité, était la création de Ne'Zuk, maintenue par les plus grands mages élémentaires. Il se dirigea vers Icathia pour affronter le Néant.

La bataille dura des semaines, une violence sans précédent à Runeterra. La magie utilisée était suffisante pour raser des civilisations. Le Néant riposta, entaillant la pierre vivante du Monolithe, dont la surface fut marquée par des cicatrices minérales appelées « malphite » (mauvaise pierre en ixtali).

Le Monolithe fut poussé au-delà de ses limites. Alors que Ne'Zuk tentait de rallier ses frères Transfigurés, la forteresse céda : elle s'écrasa au sol, ouvrant la fissure du Néant aux cieux. Une grande partie de la forteresse fut engloutie par le Néant. Ne'Zuk fut le seul Transfiguré à survivre au désastre, fuyant la folie de sa plus grande erreur.

Contre toute raison, quelques fragments du Monolithe survécurent, encore imprégnés de vie magique. La plupart s'éteignirent, mais un unique éclat perdura, enfoui profondément. Après d'innombrables siècles, il s'éveilla, réalisant qu'il était seul.

Ce dernier éclat, Malphite, est devenu une légende sur Runeterra. On dit qu'il a été aperçu partout, de Targon à Zaun. La volonté écrasante insufflée par Ne'Zuk dans le Monolithe ne s'est pas éteinte : Malphite sait qu'il doit se lever pour affronter l'obscurité résurgente, car le Néant menace à nouveau tout Runeterra.

Il lutte pour imposer un ordre sacré dans un monde chaotique, portant le poids d'être le seul survivant de son espèce.

lore_en:
Malphite is a massive living stone creature, born to serve the Monolith, a floating fortress of living stone created by the arrogant Ascended Ne'Zuk, an Ixtali elemental mage. Ne'Zuk pledged to the Shuriman Empire to create a weapon powerful enough to eradicate the Void at its source in the ruins of Icathia.

The Monolith, the size of a city, was Ne'Zuk's creation, maintained by the greatest elemental mages. It glided toward Icathia to face the Void.

The battle raged for weeks with unprecedented violence. The Void retaliated, scarring the Monolith's living stone with unnatural mineral-like wounds called "malphite" (Ixtali for "bad stone").

The Monolith was pushed beyond its limits. As Ne'Zuk fought to rally his Ascended brethren, the unthinkable happened: the fortress crashed to earth, cleaving through Icathia's bedrock and opening the Void beneath to the skies. Much of the fortress vanished into the abyssal maw. Ne'Zuk was the only Ascended to survive the disaster, fleeing his greatest folly.

Against all reason, a few fragments of the Monolith endured, still imbued with magical life. Most faded, but a single shard remained, buried deep beneath the surface. After uncounted centuries, it awakened, realizing it was alone.

This last shard, Malphite, has become a legend across Runeterra. The overwhelming drive instilled by Ne'Zuk to create order has not wavered: Malphite knows it must soon rise to meet the resurgent darkness, as the Void threatens all of Runeterra once more.

He struggles to impose a sacred order in a chaotic world, bearing the burden of being the last survivor of his kind.

spells_en.name: Seismic Shard
spells_en.tooltip: Malphite launches a shard of earth at an enemy, dealing <magicDamage>{{ qdamagecalc }} magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Slowing</status> them by {{ e2 }}% for {{ slowduration }} seconds. Malphite also steals the amount <status>Slowed</status>, gaining it as <speed>Move Speed</speed> for {{ slowduration }} seconds.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}
spells_en.description: Malphite sends a shard of the earth through the ground at his foe, dealing damage upon impact and stealing Move Speed for 3 seconds.

spells_en.name: Thunderclap
spells_en.tooltip:
Passive: Malphite gains {{ bonusarmorpassive*100 }}% Armor (%i:scaleArmor%{{ f1 }}). This effect is increased to {{ bonusarmorpassive*300 }}% (%i:scaleArmor%{{ f2 }}) while Granite Shield is active.

Active: Malphite's next Attack deals an additional {{ totalbonusdamage }} physical damage and creates an aftershock which deals {{ thunderclapsplash }} physical damage in their direction. His Attacks continue to create aftershocks for the next {{ thunderclapbuffduration }} seconds.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}
spells_en.description: Malphite attacks with such force that it creates a sonic boom. For the next few seconds, his attacks create aftershocks in front of him.

spells_en.name: Ground Slam
spells_en.tooltip: Malphite slams the ground, dealing <magicDamage>{{ edamagecalc }} magic damage</magicDamage> and reducing <attackSpeed>Attack Speed by {{ asreduction }}%</attackSpeed> for {{ duration }} seconds.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}
spells_en.description: Malphite slams the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage based on his Armor and reduces the Attack Speed of enemies for a short duration.

spells_en.name: Unstoppable Force
spells_en.tooltip: Malphite charges with the force of a landslide, dashing Unstoppably. At the end of the dash, Malphite <status>Knocks Up</status> for {{ knockupduration }} seconds and deals <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage>.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}
spells_en.description: Malphite launches himself to a location at high speed, damaging enemies and knocking them into the air.

passive_en.name: Granite Shield
passive_en.description: Malphite is shielded by a layer of rock which absorbs damage up to 10% of his maximum Health. If Malphite has not been hit for a few seconds, this effect recharges.
